review_description: At first I am not familiar with this. But when I installed it and started using I get more followers and like in my post and reels. It's really interesting. Thanks Instagram üôÇ
translated_description: Awalnya saya tidak familiar dengan hal ini. Tetapi ketika saya menginstalnya dan mulai menggunakannya, saya mendapatkan lebih banyak pengikut dan suka di postingan dan gulungan saya. Ini sangat menarik. Terima kasih Instagram üôÇ

review_description: UI is flickering & totally a mess, after installing android app.
translated_description: UI berkedip-kedip & berantakan total, setelah menginstal aplikasi Android.

review_description: Best social app I've ever seen! Now I can connect with you Instagram friends!!

review_description: Finally, a better alternative to the awful bin fire that is Twitter. Time to make real time updates and discussion safe for everyone again!
translated_description: Terakhir, alternatif yang lebih baik dari kebakaran tempat sampah yang mengerikan adalah Twitter. Saatnya membuat pembaruan dan diskusi real-time kembali aman bagi semua orang!

review_description: Great & simple socmed app, on Android, please add options on attachment so we can choose image from Albums
translated_description: Aplikasi socmed yang bagus & sederhana, di Android, silakan tambahkan opsi pada lampiran agar kami dapat memilih gambar dari Album

review_description: 100x times better than Twitter. My twitter feed feels like a trash. It's so messed up. we really needed it üò≠üòÅ
translated_description: 100x kali lebih baik dari Twitter. Umpan twitter saya terasa seperti sampah. Ini sangat kacau. kami sangat membutuhkannya üò≠üòÅ

review_description: Easy to use, very intuitive UI. Join the fun

review_description: Best App Alternative to Twitter. Account Login is So Easy with Instagram account üòÑ. Keep Developing and Also please Don't allow poltics inside the app like Twitter
translated_description: Alternatif Aplikasi Terbaik untuk Twitter. Login Akun Sangat Mudah dengan akun Instagram üòÑ. Terus Berkembang dan Juga tolong Jangan izinkan politik di dalam aplikasi seperti Twitter

review_description: Why is the app suddenly crashing and showing multiple posts at a time like it has crashed
translated_description: Mengapa aplikasi tiba-tiba mogok dan menampilkan banyak postingan sekaligus seperti mogok

review_description: Initially good, waiting for more improvements in the user interface options

review_description: Just amazing, the UI looks super cool and very smooth! üî•
translated_description: Luar biasa, UI-nya terlihat sangat keren dan mulus sekali! üî•

review_description: I want to create an account just for this app and not for Instagram. It seems like I cannot do that at the moment, so this app is useless.
translated_description: Saya ingin membuat akun hanya untuk aplikasi ini dan bukan untuk Instagram. Sepertinya saya tidak bisa melakukan itu saat ini, jadi aplikasi ini tidak berguna.

review_description: Not getting post notifications from followed accounts. Replies & likes yeh. All my notifications are on.
translated_description: Tidak mendapatkan notifikasi postingan dari akun yang diikuti. Balasan dan suka ya. Semua notifikasi saya aktif.

review_description: 1.No hashtags 2.Unable to üìå pin the threads ‚ûø on top . But one thing I like no limit on content or letters on a thread ‚ûø Good üëç.
translated_description: 1.Tidak ada hashtag 2.Tidak dapat üìå menyematkan thread ‚ûø di atas . Tapi satu hal yang saya suka tidak ada batasan konten atau huruf di thread ‚ûø Bagus üëç.

review_description: Can't say much since I'm experiencing alot of glitches, hope it fets better with an update since I can't wait to use the app
translated_description: Tidak bisa berkata banyak karena saya mengalami banyak gangguan, semoga menjadi lebih baik dengan pembaruan karena saya tidak sabar untuk menggunakan aplikasi

review_description: Yes... But frequently crash. Threads are not synchronise many times.

review_description: App lags while uploading high quality pictures. Throw you out from the app.
translated_description: Aplikasi tertinggal saat mengunggah gambar berkualitas tinggi. Mengeluarkan Anda dari aplikasi.

review_description: Can't upload photo! Tends to upload it from gallery, suddenly app exits...
translated_description: Tidak dapat mengunggah foto! Cenderung mengunggahnya dari galeri, tiba-tiba aplikasi keluar...

review_description: So far this app is sounding very promising. Let's see if the pace picks up in a few weeks!
translated_description: Sejauh ini aplikasi ini terdengar sangat menjanjikan. Mari kita lihat apakah kecepatannya meningkat dalam beberapa minggu!

review_description: This app is not working getting glitch type bug in it ...!! Need update ASAP!!
translated_description: Aplikasi ini tidak berfungsi karena ada bug jenis glitch di dalamnya...!! Perlu pembaruan secepatnya!!

review_description: Good start, but missing key features like the explore section of twitter.
translated_description: Awal yang baik, tetapi fitur utama seperti bagian jelajahi di Twitter hilang.

review_description: It's working really well, please add themed icon support for Android.
translated_description: Ini berfungsi dengan sangat baik, silakan tambahkan dukungan ikon bertema untuk Android.

review_description: It is essentially Twitter minus the Elon Musk stench. Pretty good. Needs a trending subpage though, would make it perfect.
translated_description: Ini pada dasarnya adalah Twitter tanpa bau busuk Elon Musk. Cukup bagus. Namun memerlukan subhalaman yang sedang tren, akan membuatnya sempurna.

review_description: The ui looks horrible, I feel like I'm in a IfunnyX comment section. Even the LegoLife app has a better layout!
translated_description: Uinya terlihat mengerikan, saya merasa seperti berada di bagian komentar IfunnyX. Bahkan aplikasi LegoLife memiliki tata letak yang lebih baik!

review_description: Love it! Everything works and the app seems like it's only going to get better. Good work everyone.
translated_description: Suka sekali! Semuanya berfungsi dan aplikasinya sepertinya akan menjadi lebih baik. Kerja bagus semuanya.

review_description: It bugs the first time that i used it is okay but after like 20 hours maybe because there's a lot of users are using at the past 24 hours, my followers on Instagram account is what I saw on my threads and all of my post Is gone hahaha like I only sleep for 4 hours then after that deleted all
translated_description: Ini bug pertama kali saya menggunakannya tidak apa-apa tetapi setelah sekitar 20 jam mungkin karena ada banyak pengguna yang menggunakan dalam 24 jam terakhir, pengikut saya di akun Instagram adalah apa yang saya lihat di thread saya dan semua postingan saya hilang hahaha seperti saya hanya tidur 4 jam lalu setelah itu dihapus semua

review_description: Have high hopes but not sure why I need an Instagram account. Else could use personal email or something.
translated_description: Memiliki harapan yang tinggi tetapi tidak yakin mengapa saya membutuhkan akun Instagram. Lain bisa menggunakan email pribadi atau semacamnya.

review_description: I Could Love This App, If It Would Stop Showing My An Bunch Of People I Don't Follow More Than The People I Do. I Do Not Want Suggested Post In My Main Feed. Make It So I Can Filter Them Out Or Completely Remove It.
translated_description: Saya Bisa Menyukai Aplikasi Ini, Jika Aplikasi Ini Berhenti Menampilkan Sekelompok Orang Saya Tidak Saya Ikuti Lebih Dari Orang Yang Saya Ikuti. Saya Tidak Ingin Disarankan Posting di Feed Utama Saya. Buatlah Agar Saya Dapat Memfilternya Atau Menghapusnya Sepenuhnya.

review_description: Very good app, I have just joined. I have liked it very much and all other people should also download it brothers. Well done brother!
translated_description: Aplikasi yang sangat bagus, saya baru saja bergabung. Saya sangat menyukainya dan semua orang juga harus mengunduhnya, saudara. Bagus sekali saudara!

review_description: Just signed up to threads like it the only thing missing is widgets to be able to see it on the screen
translated_description: Baru saja mendaftar ke thread seperti itu, satu-satunya yang hilang adalah widget untuk dapat melihatnya di layar

review_description: Works well & I'm enjoying it so far. There are a few features I'd like them to add in the future.
translated_description: Bekerja dengan baik & saya menikmatinya sejauh ini. Ada beberapa fitur yang saya ingin mereka tambahkan di masa mendatang.

review_description: 12m downloads in very less time is just amazing. Let see how this apps works. Am just looking for one thing. Does this app offer freedom of speech? Because meta did not but Twitter does.
translated_description: Pengunduhan 12 juta dalam waktu yang sangat singkat sungguh menakjubkan. Mari kita lihat cara kerja aplikasi ini. Saya hanya mencari satu hal. Apakah aplikasi ini menawarkan kebebasan berpendapat? Karena meta tidak melakukannya tetapi Twitter melakukannya.

review_description: App looks promising but missing some key features like hashtags, trending topics and DMs. Hope it will catch up soon and will take the toxic twitter out of the equation
translated_description: Aplikasi terlihat menjanjikan tetapi kehilangan beberapa fitur utama seperti hashtag, topik yang sedang tren, dan DM. Mudah-mudahan hal ini akan segera menyusul dan menghilangkan twitter yang beracun itu

review_description: Would rate it higher if the translate feature can be integrated like in Facebook and Instagram
translated_description: Akan menilai lebih tinggi jika fitur terjemahan dapat diintegrasikan seperti di Facebook dan Instagram

review_description: Would have rate it a 5 if the reels options in Instagram were available and some of the Instagram features
translated_description: Akan memberi nilai 5 jika opsi gulungan di Instagram tersedia dan beberapa fitur Instagram

review_description: It has been a very successful application, it has a few shortcomings, but I think they will be completed. I loved
translated_description: Ini merupakan aplikasi yang sangat sukses, memiliki beberapa kekurangan, tapi saya rasa semuanya akan selesai. aku cinta

review_description: It's good, I just need my in-app name to be independent from instagram, aswell as account switching
translated_description: Bagus, saya hanya perlu nama dalam aplikasi saya independen dari instagram, serta peralihan akun

review_description: It's just like it's rival but , it lets you automatically follow your Instagram followers/ following.
translated_description: Ini seperti saingannya tetapi, ini memungkinkan Anda secara otomatis mengikuti pengikut/pengikut Instagram Anda.

review_description: Just way more user friendly than twitter. Easy to sign up if you already insta as well.
translated_description: Jauh lebih ramah pengguna daripada twitter. Mudah untuk mendaftar jika Anda sudah melakukan insta juga.

review_description: Good start but the Android version needs a dark mode in the worst way.
translated_description: Awal yang baik tetapi versi Android membutuhkan mode gelap dalam kondisi terburuk.

review_description: It's kinda slow when it comes into unfollowing people. I've unfollowed one account twice but it still appears that I'm following her. How ridiculous üòÇ
translated_description: Agak lambat dalam hal berhenti mengikuti orang. Saya sudah berhenti mengikuti satu akun dua kali tetapi tampaknya saya masih mengikutinya. Konyol sekali üòÇ

review_description: Not able to find direct sharing options from insta or auto sync as what I expected
translated_description: Tidak dapat menemukan opsi berbagi langsung dari insta atau sinkronisasi otomatis seperti yang saya harapkan

review_description: Need #hashtags, $cashtags, search function for text, bookmarks, DMs and draft functionality to make it remotely usable.
translated_description: Perlu #hashtags, $cashtags, fungsi pencarian teks, bookmark, DM, dan fungsi draf agar dapat digunakan dari jarak jauh.

review_description: trash app. theres no settings and missing very basic features.
translated_description: aplikasi sampah. tidak ada pengaturan dan kehilangan fitur-fitur yang sangat mendasar.

review_description: I have a problem where I rethread mark Zuckerberg post and then it simply looks there two rethread in my timeline even though it is the same post. Hope u can fix it
translated_description: Saya mempunyai masalah ketika saya membaca ulang postingan Mark Zuckerberg dan kemudian terlihat ada dua thread ulang di timeline saya meskipun itu adalah postingan yang sama. Semoga kamu bisa memperbaikinya

review_description: Felt kinda comfortable in this app! Don't knw why but it's friendly and kinda better than Twitter.
translated_description: Merasa nyaman dengan aplikasi ini! Tidak tahu kenapa tapi ini ramah dan lebih baik daripada Twitter.

review_description: Having Glitch on my account Interfreace that is not showing things clear like full page is shaking and being blury so please look at it...
translated_description: Ada Glitch di Antarmuka akun saya yang tidak menampilkan sesuatu dengan jelas seperti halaman penuh bergetar dan buram jadi silakan lihat...

review_description: I can't believe I'm giving 5 stars to a Meta app but it works as described. And every star helps Elon to be a bit more miserable.
translated_description: Saya tidak percaya saya memberikan 5 bintang pada aplikasi Meta tetapi berfungsi seperti yang dijelaskan. Dan setiap bintang membantu Elon menjadi lebih sengsara.

review_description: Good app, nice features.... Now underrated people can get some reach without reels.
translated_description: Aplikasi bagus, fitur bagus.... Sekarang orang yang diremehkan bisa mendapatkan jangkauan tanpa reel.

review_description: Good. But if follow several people at once, always showing restricted massages. That's nonsense
translated_description: Bagus. Namun jika mengikuti beberapa orang sekaligus, selalu menampilkan pijatan terbatas. Itu tidak masuk akal

review_description: Unable to upload pictures. The app keeps crashing.

review_description: Installed today 6th July 2023. Threads is currently tied to Instagram account. But the link to Instagram and Facebook should be optional. It should be a standalone app like Facebook or twitter.

review_description: The issue was finally fixed.... woohoo üéâ I feel like kissing you guys.....but lol that'd be thru the phone, great work!
translated_description: Masalahnya akhirnya terselesaikan.... woohoo üéâ Rasanya ingin mencium kalian.....tapi haha, itu lewat telepon, kerja bagus!

review_description: Glitchy on my device. Can't view anything. It just goes double-triple vision

review_description: Too much of glitch. Can't use The app at all as it glitches continuously.
translated_description: Terlalu banyak kesalahan. Tidak dapat menggunakan aplikasi sama sekali karena terus menerus mengalami gangguan.

review_description: Develop the best space than that of Twitter and more other cool features but its so cool Ctrl+C & Ctrl+V

review_description: Hope you got the user name you wanted on Instagram. This feature less app can't do anything... All account stuff is run through insta. DOA.

review_description: Threads is a new app, built by the Instagram team, for sharing text updates and joining public conversations....
translated_description: Threads adalah aplikasi baru, yang dibuat oleh tim Instagram, untuk berbagi pembaruan teks dan bergabung dalam percakapan publik....

review_description: It's glitching. Texts are cascading over other texts and pictures

review_description: I can't post pictures, it's keeps crashing when I choose pictures and press done
translated_description: Saya tidak bisa memposting gambar, terus mogok saat saya memilih gambar dan menekan selesai

review_description: i hope... with this new apps, my store can increase revenue, branding, and productivity. 5 Stars For META, Cheers Universe.
translated_description: Saya berharap... dengan aplikasi baru ini, toko saya dapat meningkatkan pendapatan, branding, dan produktivitas. 5 Bintang Untuk META, Cheers Universe.

review_description: We are the early users of Threads app. I want our next generation to see this review and know that we were the early users of these threads apps but after I joined these threads apps I will add many memories with these apps which I will miss a lot in future.‚ù£Ô∏èü•∞üß°
translated_description: Kami adalah pengguna awal aplikasi Threads. Saya ingin generasi berikutnya melihat ulasan ini dan mengetahui bahwa kami adalah pengguna awal aplikasi thread ini, tetapi setelah saya bergabung dengan aplikasi thread ini, saya akan menambahkan banyak kenangan dengan aplikasi ini yang akan sangat saya rindukan di masa mendatang.‚ù£Ô∏èü•∞üß°

review_description: When I scroll down or up, my whole display just messed up with the letterers. Fix it ASAP @Mark_Juckerburg

review_description: It's early days so we will see where this app goes. But could the billion dollar company behind Instagram and now Threads please work out how to make an app for tablets/foldables too... I mean come on...
translated_description: Ini masih tahap awal jadi kita akan melihat ke mana arah aplikasi ini. Tapi bisakah perusahaan bernilai miliaran dolar di belakang Instagram dan sekarang Threads mencari tahu cara membuat aplikasi untuk tablet/perangkat lipat juga... Maksud saya, ayolah...

review_description: It's taking many permissions and while using heating the phone. It's a trap for looting data

review_description: Why am I opening another app to connect more app. To view the same things I would view on the previous app pages?

review_description: More like insta and doesn't look like it had more of idea to be created I can edit my review based on changes brought by Meta but for now ... it just looks like insta without reels

review_description: I do not plan on allocating time to this app, apart from the time setting up this app as private, as I am the author of: cups of tea songbook

review_description: A great alternative to Twitter, filled with a fun community and is very safe for people.

review_description: I wish it wasn't a separate application and was connected and inside Instagram!

review_description: Seems ok,but my only gripe so far,is that you cannot see what you are writing due to the keyboard being over it!

review_description: Good so far but there NEEDS to be a setting that lets me see only the posts of the accounts I follow, not just random ones. That's what twitter tried to do & everyone hates it so please add this asap please. What's the point of following someone of I can't see their posts.

Itulah yang coba dilakukan oleh twitter & semua orang membencinya, jadi harap tambahkan ini secepatnya. Apa gunanya mengikuti seseorang yang saya tidak dapat melihat postingannya.

review_description: Nice experience but i think ü§î you can add pictures save mode in you phone gallery like a Facebook...
translated_description: Pengalaman yang menyenangkan tapi menurut saya ü§î Anda dapat menambahkan mode penyimpanan gambar di galeri ponsel Anda seperti Facebook...

review_description: Just a replica of Twitter it looks as if they just copied the source code for Twitter and used that and basically nothing is different
translated_description: Hanya replika Twitter sepertinya mereka baru saja menyalin kode sumber Twitter dan menggunakannya dan pada dasarnya tidak ada yang berbeda

review_description: Looks interesting but honestly looks like Instagram lite rather than Twitter's competition.
translated_description: Kelihatannya menarik tapi sejujurnya lebih mirip Instagram lite daripada pesaing Twitter.

review_description: This app looks promising. I hope this surpasses Twitter and follow certain limitations in terms of free speech and counteract misinformation and disinformation.
translated_description: Aplikasi ini terlihat menjanjikan. Saya berharap ini melampaui Twitter dan mengikuti batasan tertentu dalam hal kebebasan berpendapat dan melawan misinformasi dan disinformasi.

review_description: The app is getting crash. I don't know why but it crashed please help me
translated_description: Aplikasinya mogok. Saya tidak tahu kenapa tapi macet tolong bantu saya

review_description: Good Twitter alternative, but at the moment the app crashes whenever I post HD images
translated_description: Alternatif Twitter yang bagus, tetapi saat ini aplikasinya mogok setiap kali saya memposting gambar HD

review_description: It a very good alternative to twitter. But i have concerns about my data. Overall good
translated_description: Ini alternatif yang sangat bagus untuk twitter. Tapi saya punya kekhawatiran tentang data saya. Secara keseluruhan bagus

review_description: I get it it's a new apss but too much crash. Also please accept webm format video.
translated_description: Saya mengerti itu adalah apss baru tetapi terlalu banyak crash. Juga harap terima video berformat webm.

review_description: I think I am the first to give feedback about the application, it is very cool and entertaining, I loved it ü´∂üèªü©∑
translated_description: Saya rasa saya orang pertama yang memberikan masukan tentang aplikasi ini, sangat keren dan menghibur, saya menyukainya ü´∂üèªü©∑

review_description: Nice app, but there is one lacking. Please do include log-in for Facebook also.
translated_description: Aplikasi bagus, tapi ada satu yang kurang. Harap sertakan login untuk Facebook juga.

review_description: It's good but a few bugs here and there eg I keep copying text by mistake
translated_description: Itu bagus tetapi ada beberapa bug di sana-sini misalnya saya terus-menerus menyalin teks secara tidak sengaja

review_description: Overall positive, just needs a private messaging feature.
translated_description: Secara keseluruhan positif, hanya memerlukan fitur pesan pribadi.

review_description: I only want to see posts from the accounts i follow. I'm interested in others posts. Add Following tab in Timeline.
translated_description: Saya hanya ingin melihat postingan dari akun yang saya ikuti. Saya tertarik dengan postingan orang lain. Tambahkan tab Mengikuti di Timeline.

review_description: It's a good app but we want also want a personal chat system with known or unknown person
translated_description: Ini aplikasi yang bagus tetapi kami juga menginginkan sistem obrolan pribadi dengan orang yang dikenal atau tidak dikenal

review_description: Needs a trending page and other forms of seeing what is currently happening around areas of the world being news and/or other forms of connectivity
translated_description: Membutuhkan halaman trending dan bentuk lain untuk melihat apa yang sedang terjadi di seluruh dunia berupa berita dan/atau bentuk konektivitas lainnya

review_description: Reviews are being deleted. Data and privacy issues. Major ones. Your information is not safe. Nor are your rights.
translated_description: Ulasan sedang dihapus. Masalah data dan privasi. Yang utama. Informasi Anda tidak aman. Hak Anda juga tidak.

review_description: Sucks up too much memory off of my phone. And it's choppy, not fluid way to use it.
translated_description: Menghisap terlalu banyak memori dari ponsel saya. Dan cara menggunakannya berombak, bukan cair.

review_description: Fix the huge glitch please. The app is not usable since last night.
translated_description: Tolong perbaiki kesalahan besar ini. Aplikasi tidak dapat digunakan sejak tadi malam.

review_description: My Instagram accounts is keep getting log out when I login to threads, & when I go login to Insta then my threads account gets logged out automatically please resolve this
translated_description: Akun Instagram saya terus logout ketika saya login ke thread, & ketika saya login ke Insta maka akun thread saya logout secara otomatis tolong selesaikan ini

review_description: I'm facing some problems suck as replying with gifs are not working properly. Hope it fix this soon
translated_description: Saya menghadapi beberapa masalah karena membalas dengan gif tidak berfungsi dengan benar. Semoga ini segera memperbaikinya

review_description: The UI and UX is awesome. They should add trends.
translated_description: UI dan UXnya luar biasa. Mereka harus menambahkan tren.

review_description: Could really benefit from an Instagram like feed (people you follow first, then other suggested posts after).
translated_description: Benar-benar dapat memperoleh manfaat dari umpan suka Instagram (orang yang Anda ikuti terlebih dahulu, kemudian kiriman lain yang disarankan setelahnya).

review_description: I don't know why but my thread app isn't giving me a clear view as I scroll up it begins to hang kindly rectify this...
translated_description: Saya tidak tahu mengapa, tetapi aplikasi utas saya tidak memberi saya pandangan yang jelas saat saya menggulir ke atas, aplikasi itu mulai hang, mohon perbaiki ini...

review_description: Nothing is visible properly the screen is glitching out check email for more information

review_description: The app is great, but so far, I'm just having trouble with sometimes refreshing.
translated_description: Aplikasinya bagus, tapi sejauh ini, saya hanya mengalami masalah saat menyegarkan diri.

review_description: So is this app available in the EU or not? Because I was able to download it and follow a bunch of pages just fine, but now it's just "something went wrong" all the time. What's up?
translated_description: Jadi apakah aplikasi ini tersedia di UE atau tidak? Karena saya dapat mengunduhnya dan mengikuti banyak halaman dengan baik, tetapi sekarang selalu ada yang tidak beres. Ada apa?

review_description: The app is OK, just remember meta is scraping your phone to get everything it can sell.

review_description: Stealing the Twitter concept doesn't make you creative, but a thife. Good job, Mark, for stealing.

review_description: Great app almost similar to twitter. Lol i love the vibe with the app but why does it scramble when you try scrolling through posts?
translated_description: Aplikasi hebat hampir mirip dengan twitter. Haha, aku suka suasana aplikasinya, tapi kenapa aplikasinya kacau saat kamu mencoba menelusuri postingan?

review_description: Unusable. The screen gets clogged and messed up.
translated_description: Tidak dapat digunakan. Layar menjadi tersumbat dan kacau.

review_description: Good app for timepass and fun,but it same like Twitter just that one thing you need to notice.....

review_description: Feels like the meshing together of Twitter and Instagram with a slick and smooth feel to it

review_description: Nice interface. Liked this. hopefully this will be something great.

review_description: The issue with the app I am facing is it freezes when i upload a photo.
translated_description: Masalah dengan aplikasi yang saya hadapi adalah aplikasi terhenti saat saya mengunggah foto.

review_description: I love thisüòç, no adsüòç yet but I'm sure they won't be longüòû. Really easy to use üòé

review_description: I want a direct messager like instagram and want to see trending like twitter and I want to able to download pics like twitter and I might be able to translate other language text introduce these feature as soon as possible
translated_description: Saya ingin pesan langsung seperti instagram dan ingin melihat trending seperti twitter dan saya ingin dapat mengunduh foto seperti twitter dan saya mungkin bisa menerjemahkan teks bahasa lain, perkenalkan fitur ini sesegera mungkin

review_description: Its a great app, it filled with positivity. Definitely a great idea

review_description: The home screen is just mixing up everything maybe a bug please fix it

review_description: Good start but still needs so many features like Twitter if meta really wants to succeed.

review_description: When i refresh the app, it glitches so i need to close the app and open it again to remove the glitches

review_description: üçèSo beautiful üçèI really love threads app üçè. Just hoping for more features üìå add up more features üìå please üìç

review_description: This app can be used by scammers. It should provide information on where the account profile is based like in Instagram. Again, please provide information on where the account is based.

review_description: App malfunctioning on my phone. It glitches really really bad, please fix!

review_description: Can't pick a new username. It's automatically the one from Instagram. Also this app has 4599 ratings and nobody bothered to write a comment? Guess you can buy anything these days.

review_description: Underwhelming, not a replacement for twitter. Best thing I could say is garbage.

review_description: Android version can't select album when posting image while iOS version can, what the...

review_description: I don't have time for instagram, but I'd like to use this new app like my Twitter , unfortunately I have to delete it and stick to Twitter since I can't register without having instagram account üò¢
translated_description: Saya tidak punya waktu untuk instagram, tapi saya ingin menggunakan aplikasi baru ini seperti Twitter saya, sayangnya saya harus menghapusnya dan tetap menggunakan Twitter karena saya tidak bisa mendaftar tanpa memiliki akun instagram üò¢

review_description: I deactivated my Threads account, still the threads badge is visible on my Insta profile. I "hid" the badge from profile section, but it keeps on coming back, why? I don't want to use Threads anymore. There should be a delete account feature for Threads. Since I've deactivated my account, the badge shouldn't be there at the first place!
translated_description: Saya menonaktifkan akun Threads saya, lencana thread masih terlihat di profil Insta saya. Saya "menyembunyikan" lencana dari bagian profil, tetapi lencana itu terus muncul kembali, mengapa? Saya tidak ingin menggunakan Threads lagi. Harus ada fitur hapus akun untuk Threads. Karena saya telah menonaktifkan akun saya, lencananya seharusnya tidak ada lagi!

review_description: This thread is really good about looking at pictures and information what's in here but it's worth it. üëç

review_description: The app is nice, but there is no option to send Dm and no trending hashtags

review_description: So, you can't delete you account w/o also deleting your Instagram account and on top of that your feed is full of people that have nothing to do w your interest. Got it.

review_description: I personally don't trust any of Zuckerberg's products in terms of security and others. Thank You

review_description: This new app was awesome!!! The cool here is your acc is connected to Instagram!!! Not laggy and I literally enjoyed this Threads!!!

review_description: When I video is muted, raising my phone volume should unmute the video.

review_description: Nice I demand the ability to save images, and I also demand to search for topics such as Twitter

review_description: alternative for twitter thats it their is no much new feature to attract the audience infact twitter is the best to develop you , this theards meant for time pass conversations

review_description: The display is still glitch on Android, I can't even see what content is displayed

review_description: Too much bugs and glitches.want to upload pic but there is no option here .

review_description: I find this app way better than Twitter as all your accounts are linked, and is not dominanted by posts by mostly one person (Elon).

review_description: Just downloaded the app (brand new) and I already like it, tbf I think it's better than Twitter but that's my opinion. I can't wait for the future work that will be put into this (future updates). *Definitely recommended!*

review_description: Would be good to see a direct message option. Otherwise pretty pleased with this new Meta app.

review_description: The app is fantastic but you can't get a permanent link for it, It keeps breaking

review_description: App full of bugs everytime open app crashes and closed not I am not recommended to use this app

review_description: Very awesome app üíØüíØ...but i think it needs more features e.g sending direct message

review_description: First attempt. It's good. Hopefully more updates in the future will strengthen the usability of this app.

review_description: It won't let me create an account. You must have an Instagram account to join. A Facebook account isn't good enough.

review_description: Great alternative to twitter. it's time to pull the blue bird down.

review_description: Worst privacy policy.. even you can not delete your own data from the account. If you create account and not like it you can not delete account and remove your data. The only way is they asked you to delete your Instagram account.

review_description: It's a good start....10M+ followers in less than 24 hours.........and need to improve lot of things.....hope you will improve as soon as possible ....

review_description: application is smooth for operating and look feel is smooth Good work team Threads...

review_description: When i try to post it shows "your thread failed to upload" but there is no specific reason why?

review_description: App looks good. Congratulations to the Team. Great job done.

review_description: Android mobiles can't able too access properly. It's blurred.

review_description: App is laging I opened one tab than so many tabs are being opend showing like server hacked so many linings what's the issues?

review_description: You have to use same username that is on Instagram. I am already not happy with the username there and now I have to stick the same username with here so that is my major issue..

review_description: I am happy to join Thread. It's simple and fantastic, it's better than some other social apps.

review_description: Title: A Game-Changer for Social Engagement - Instagram Thread App Review Rating: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è (5/5) Review: Instagram Thread has undoubtedly transformed the way we connect and engage with others on social media. As an avid Instagram user, I am thrilled to share my experience with this remarkable new app. Instagram Thread takes the concept of storytelling to a whole new level, allowing users to dive deeper into conversations and share their thoughts in a more meaningful and organized way.
translated_description: Judul: Pengubah Permainan untuk Keterlibatan Sosial - Peringkat Ulasan Aplikasi Thread Instagram: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è (5/5) Ulasan: Thread Instagram tidak diragukan lagi telah mengubah cara kita terhubung dan terlibat dengan orang lain di media sosial. Sebagai pengguna Instagram yang rajin, saya sangat senang berbagi pengalaman saya dengan aplikasi baru yang luar biasa ini. Instagram Thread membawa konsep bercerita ke tingkat yang baru, memungkinkan pengguna menyelami percakapan lebih dalam dan berbagi pemikiran mereka dengan cara yang lebih bermakna dan terorganisir.

review_description: Well, for a new app it's good. Just a few updates and it'll be an awesome alternative to Twitter.

review_description: Not better than Twitter at all, it's just an extension of Instagram that acts like Twitter.

review_description: 99% of the content I see are from accounts that cross post the same empty platitudes, engagement bait, or junk news on every site. The rest are influencers who I nor anyone have ever heard of. I still see new posts by accounts I've blocked. This app is a ploy for Zuckerberg to take over the Fediverse, but currently it's complete garbage. This app will not cultivate a real culture in its current form. Even the influencers themselves are complaining. Draconian Meta content rules still apply.
translated_description: 99% konten yang saya lihat berasal dari akun yang memposting kata-kata hampa, umpan keterlibatan, atau berita sampah yang sama di setiap situs. Sisanya adalah influencer yang belum pernah saya atau siapa pun dengar. Saya masih melihat postingan baru dari akun yang saya blokir. Aplikasi ini merupakan taktik Zuckerberg untuk mengambil alih Fediverse, namun saat ini aplikasi tersebut benar-benar sampah. Aplikasi ini tidak akan menumbuhkan budaya nyata dalam bentuknya yang sekarang. Bahkan para influencer sendiri pun mengeluh. Aturan konten Meta Draconian masih berlaku.

review_description: Threde App Revive Request Threde app revive 5star I apologize, but I'm not familiar with an app called "Threde" that you mentioned. It's possible that the app is new or relatively unknown, or it may not exist at all. If you could provide more information about the app or clarify your request, I'll do my best to assist you.

Mungkin saja aplikasi tersebut baru atau relatif tidak dikenal, atau mungkin tidak ada sama sekali. Jika Anda dapat memberikan informasi lebih lanjut tentang aplikasi atau memperjelas permintaan Anda, saya akan melakukan yang terbaik untuk membantu Anda.

review_description: Such a great functional app that Meta has ever done. I believe that Threads will be the next big thing in the future.

review_description: It's kinda confusing at first, but once u get kinda used to it, it's gonna feel normal to u. 4/5 for me bc it kinda copies twitter idk.
translated_description: Awalnya agak membingungkan, tetapi setelah Anda terbiasa, itu akan terasa normal bagi Anda. 4/5 untuk saya karena itu agak menyalin twitter entahlah.

review_description: So many bugs while writing keep showing my keyboards not keys, Fix that issue
translated_description: Begitu banyak bug saat menulis yang terus menampilkan keyboard saya, bukan tombol, Perbaiki masalah itu

review_description: Its okay but the app doesnt allowe explicit which is dumb because the app shouldnt be for kids or young teens in the first place.
translated_description: Tidak apa-apa tetapi aplikasinya tidak mengizinkan hal-hal eksplisit yang bodoh karena aplikasi tersebut tidak boleh ditujukan untuk anak-anak atau remaja.

review_description: As soon as I select a picture to add post the app is closing immediately üòï
translated_description: Segera setelah saya memilih gambar untuk ditambahkan postingan, aplikasi langsung ditutup üòï

review_description: Trying out the app. It's very new at this time, so who knows. So far it seems alright, there's content, a lot of big names are already using it. I've never used Twitter, so I don't know how it compares. I will state here, I've heard rumors that Threads will be actively censoring nazi content, and I'm here for that. Looking forward to nazi-free social media experience
translated_description: Mencoba aplikasinya. Ini sangat baru saat ini, jadi siapa yang tahu. Sejauh ini sepertinya baik-baik saja, isinya ada, banyak nama besar yang sudah menggunakannya. Saya belum pernah menggunakan Twitter, jadi saya tidak tahu perbandingannya. Saya akan nyatakan di sini, saya pernah mendengar rumor bahwa Threads akan secara aktif menyensor konten nazi, dan saya di sini untuk itu. Menantikan pengalaman media sosial bebas nazi

review_description: It's a great app and it does look like it could rival Twitter. I wonder what else would Zuck would do next to it....
translated_description: Ini adalah aplikasi hebat dan sepertinya bisa menyaingi Twitter. Aku ingin tahu apa lagi yang akan Zuck lakukan selanjutnya....

review_description: There is some glitch while opening replies section via push notification üòï its not showing
translated_description: Ada beberapa kesalahan saat membuka bagian balasan melalui pemberitahuan push üòï tidak muncul

review_description: Don't like the recommendations. Would be appreciated if the recommendations can be turn off.
translated_description: Tidak suka dengan rekomendasinya. Akan sangat dihargai jika rekomendasinya dapat dimatikan.

review_description: I am not able to scroll in the notifications centre. Please fix this
translated_description: Saya tidak dapat menggulir di pusat notifikasi. Tolong perbaiki ini

review_description: I cannot search posts by tags like current trends. Twitter is now in business, political, media league... We all know Instagram and TikTok audience.
translated_description: Saya tidak dapat mencari postingan berdasarkan tag seperti tren saat ini. Twitter sekarang berada di liga bisnis, politik, media... Kita semua tahu pemirsa Instagram dan TikTok.

review_description: Another copy and great way to steal our data. I can't even delete my account.
translated_description: Salinan lain dan cara hebat untuk mencuri data kami. Aku bahkan tidak bisa menghapus akunku.

review_description: Trash apps, don't use it cz its collecting your private information and its copy paste twitter nothing new.
translated_description: Aplikasi sampah, jangan gunakan karena itu mengumpulkan informasi pribadi Anda dan menyalin tempel twitter bukan hal baru.

review_description: Great App Overall. Won't be long till it overtakes Twitter
translated_description: Aplikasi Hebat Secara Keseluruhan. Tidak akan lama lagi sampai ia menyalip Twitter

review_description: God where are all these negative reviews coming from? The app is not even 3 days old. It's not going to have exactly what everyone wants. I think improvements and features will get better over time..The reviews where people are saying they can't sign up or it's difficult especially when they already have Instagram is laughable to me. It took me 1 minute..
translated_description: Ya Tuhan, dari mana semua ulasan negatif ini berasal? Aplikasi ini bahkan belum berumur 3 hari. Hal ini tidak akan memberikan apa yang diinginkan semua orang. Saya pikir peningkatan dan fitur akan menjadi lebih baik dari waktu ke waktu..Ulasan di mana orang mengatakan mereka tidak bisa mendaftar atau sulit terutama ketika mereka sudah memiliki Instagram adalah hal yang menggelikan bagi saya. Butuh waktu 1 menit..

review_description: this needs a chronological feed free of algorithm-suggested posts or else I'm never gonna use it.
translated_description: ini memerlukan umpan kronologis yang bebas dari postingan yang disarankan algoritma atau saya tidak akan pernah menggunakannya.

review_description: The motto is "say more" .... But only in 480 letters. Really? Say more, but not much. Even in this app review I can write 500 letters. How I can describe my opinion in 480 letters? Increase it or bye
translated_description: Mottonya adalah "katakan lebih banyak" .... Tapi hanya dalam 480 huruf. Benar-benar? Katakan lebih banyak, tapi jangan banyak. Bahkan dalam review aplikasi ini saya bisa menulis 500 surat. Bagaimana saya bisa menggambarkan pendapat saya dalam 480 huruf? Tingkatkan atau sampai jumpa

review_description: Keep getting fail to upload have cleared cache but still not working
translated_description: Terus gagal mengunggah telah membersihkan cache tetapi masih tidak berfungsi

review_description: Needs DogeCoin payment transaction! Everything else is almost an exact copy of the competition.

review_description: When scrolling, the images and texts get confused

review_description: Really stinks. It wouldnt allow me to set up an account as I dont want Instagram.

review_description: If u put dark mode and enable messaging and stories it will be the best social app ever

review_description: This app is so much better than Facebook I would say. I think its just new app thats why this is kinda fun and good but after when this app got famous or something this will be worse Ikr. Anyways lets see
translated_description: Aplikasi ini jauh lebih baik daripada Facebook menurut saya. Saya pikir ini hanya aplikasi baru, itulah mengapa ini menyenangkan dan bagus, tetapi setelah aplikasi ini menjadi terkenal atau semacamnya, ini akan menjadi lebih buruk, Ikr. Bagaimanapun, mari kita lihat

review_description: It's an amazing app Simple and clean Hope the voice goes loud üì¢

review_description: Amazing, hopefully this is more better than twitter. Twitter is so much idiot things planned to their apps. Like limit post, suspended accounts, and the others.

review_description: JFC SHOW THE LATEST NOT THE CURATEST. The app is good but stop assuming my news feed. Do better

review_description: Threads works fine like Twitter. Easy adding friends from Instagram.

review_description: I don't have IG... So I can't log in? Please change this setting for thus who only want few apps. Thanks!

review_description: Need to make it so we can delete the app without deleting our Instagram accounts or you'll lose users/not gain them.

review_description: This app is very cool nd its features is very easy to use nd name is osm(Threads). Now we will replying to anyone " Main Use Threads Kr dunga"

review_description: Very competent but doesn't do well with the details

review_description: Wow this is very awesome app compare to all other app. I pray That like all apps in the Meta family, it should be number one in the world. From today I am a member of the meta family.
translated_description: Wow, ini aplikasi yang sangat luar biasa dibandingkan dengan semua aplikasi lainnya. Saya berdoa agar seperti semua aplikasi di keluarga Meta, aplikasi ini harus menjadi nomor satu di dunia. Mulai hari ini saya adalah anggota keluarga meta.

review_description: Great start than making a monopoly, data should be stolen/sold from one place and that is facebook/meta server. Thank you zuck Bhai.

translated_description: Aplikasi bagus sejauh ini. Sederhana. Hanya perlu menyesuaikan beberapa hal seperti saat ini kami tidak dapat membaca balasan kutipan lainnya.

review_description: Worst app please don't download Instagram users you'll loose your Instagram account and can't use it properly
translated_description: Aplikasi terburuk tolong jangan unduh pengguna Instagram Anda akan kehilangan akun Instagram Anda dan tidak dapat menggunakannya dengan benar

review_description: Would be great if it didn't throw up error message on my first attempt and wouldn't let me use it at all
translated_description: Akan lebih bagus jika tidak memunculkan pesan kesalahan pada percobaan pertama saya dan tidak mengizinkan saya menggunakannya sama sekali

review_description: I think it's better than twitter but adding chatting option will be good for now.
translated_description: Saya pikir ini lebih baik daripada twitter tetapi menambahkan opsi chatting akan lebih baik untuk saat ini.

review_description: it's pretty fun & you can post whatever you want & follow your friends & keep up w them. : ) 20/10
translated_description: itu cukup menyenangkan & Anda dapat memposting apa pun yang Anda inginkan untuk mengikuti teman Anda & terus mengikuti perkembangan mereka. : ) 20/10

review_description: Early rating. Still a lot of work need to be done. Like the look of the app.
translated_description: Peringkat awal. Masih banyak pekerjaan yang harus diselesaikan. Seperti tampilan aplikasinya.

review_description: It's high on ping... downloaded twice still the app is glitching
translated_description: Pingnya tinggi... diunduh dua kali masih saja aplikasinya bermasalah

review_description: Hard to find the people you follow as it just gives you hundreds of random posts.
translated_description: Sulit menemukan orang yang Anda ikuti karena hanya memberi Anda ratusan postingan acak.

review_description: Great concept. Notifications not refreshing.
translated_description: Konsep yang bagus. Notifikasi tidak menyegarkan.

review_description: no DMs, no hashtags, no feed in chronological order, no trending topics, buggy AF, and trying to delete threads profile will result in Instagram profile being nuked, pffffff
translated_description: tidak ada DM, tidak ada hashtag, tidak ada feed dalam urutan kronologis, tidak ada trending topik, buggy AF, dan mencoba menghapus profil thread akan mengakibatkan profil Instagram di-nuked, pffffff

review_description: Finally found an app that doesn't immediately go away from what it's meant to be 10/10
translated_description: Akhirnya menemukan aplikasi yang tidak langsung hilang dari maksudnya 10/10

review_description: Needs a lot of improvement...app crashes on my android..
translated_description: Perlu banyak perbaikan...aplikasi mogok di android saya..

review_description: Ok so this thing is just like twitter but it's a mix between Instagram and Twitter Real impressive in my opinion
translated_description: Ok jadi ini sama seperti twitter tetapi merupakan perpaduan antara Instagram dan Twitter Sangat mengesankan menurut saya

review_description: It's fantastic but it's not showing how much reach your post got like Twitter
translated_description: Ini luar biasa tetapi tidak menunjukkan seberapa besar jangkauan postingan Anda seperti Twitter

review_description: The scroll is not that smooth. I have to work harder to scroll.
translated_description: Gulungannya tidak begitu mulus. Saya harus bekerja lebih keras untuk menggulir.

review_description: Okay, I'm changing my rate. This app is addictive. I'm looking forward for the further development of this app.
translated_description: Oke, aku mengubah tarifku. Aplikasi ini membuat ketagihan. Saya menantikan pengembangan lebih lanjut dari aplikasi ini.

review_description: Tooo much good, but needs more features like double tap to like
translated_description: Terlalu bagus, tapi perlu lebih banyak fitur seperti ketuk dua kali untuk menyukai

review_description: Please fix bug, after finished image upload the app always Forced Closed
translated_description: Harap perbaiki bug, setelah selesai mengunggah gambar, aplikasi selalu Ditutup Paksa

review_description: My app glitches when I scroll, until I minimize then return to app. üò†
translated_description: Aplikasi saya bermasalah saat saya gulir, hingga saya perkecil lalu kembali ke aplikasi. üò†

review_description: Not working words are overlapped in the feed post.
translated_description: Kata-kata yang tidak berfungsi tumpang tindih di postingan feed.

review_description: All features are best but i can't send message to new threads friendsü•≤
translated_description: Semua fitur terbaik tetapi saya tidak dapat mengirim pesan ke thread baru temanü•≤

review_description: Crashing every time I try to add a picture.
translated_description: Crash setiap kali saya mencoba menambahkan gambar.

review_description: Feels like using a cheap version of Twitter. If meta was so eager to Create something like Twitter then he should have tried to buy Twitter. Just feels bad with this app.
translated_description: Serasa menggunakan Twitter versi murah. Jika meta sangat ingin membuat sesuatu seperti Twitter maka dia seharusnya mencoba membeli Twitter. Rasanya tidak enak dengan aplikasi ini.

review_description: It's simple because it's so new, but I'm liking it so far, and I can't wait to see what new features get added in the future
translated_description: Sederhana karena masih sangat baru, namun sejauh ini saya menyukainya, dan saya tidak sabar untuk melihat fitur baru apa yang akan ditambahkan di masa mendatang.

review_description: Should also add other like features like linkedin has (celebrate, love, laugh)
translated_description: Sebaiknya juga menambahkan fitur serupa lainnya seperti yang dimiliki linkedin (merayakan, mencintai, tertawa)

review_description: While scrolling the entire app becomes glitchy. Can't even use it
translated_description: Saat menggulir seluruh aplikasi menjadi bermasalah. Bahkan tidak bisa menggunakannya

review_description: I can't post..when I'm trying to post..app automatically closed.üòè
translated_description: Saya tidak dapat memposting..ketika saya mencoba memposting..aplikasi ditutup secara otomatis.üòè

review_description: Feed is cluttered with posts from accounts I don't follow and most likely have no intention of following.
translated_description: Umpan penuh dengan postingan dari akun yang tidak saya ikuti dan kemungkinan besar tidak ada niat untuk mengikuti.

review_description: another meta app stealing data and private info even without option to opt out, its no replacement for Twitter, and should be banned
translated_description: aplikasi meta lain yang mencuri data dan informasi pribadi bahkan tanpa opsi untuk tidak ikut serta, ini bukan pengganti Twitter, dan harus dilarang

review_description: Frequent to crash everytime. Fix it!
translated_description: Sering crash setiap saat. Memperbaikinya!

review_description: wasted many hours downloading this app yesterday. Once I went near Instagram my Threads information was not locatable
translated_description: membuang waktu berjam-jam mengunduh aplikasi ini kemarin. Begitu saya mendekati Instagram, informasi Thread saya tidak dapat ditemukan

review_description: it was good at first but as long as you use it often, it suspends both your Instagram and threads account
translated_description: awalnya bagus, tetapi selama Anda sering menggunakannya, akun Instagram dan thread Anda akan ditangguhkan

review_description: Dear Sir / Mam I'm very very excited for this application. Even i can't enjoy like this application. Brilliant thanks for designed this application. thanks.
translated_description: Dear Sir / Mam Saya sangat sangat bersemangat untuk aplikasi ini. Bahkan saya tidak dapat menikmati aplikasi seperti ini. Terima kasih yang luar biasa telah merancang aplikasi ini. terima kasih.

review_description: The reason 3 stars because the needs or something, first it needs to have like a translator,
translated_description: Alasan bintang 3 karena kebutuhan atau apalah, pertama-tama perlu punya seperti penerjemah,

review_description: A new social media app yet you can't even do a hashtag? A one simple thing that all of socmed has even Facebook and Instagram yet there's none in Threads. Like what?
translated_description: Aplikasi media sosial baru namun Anda bahkan tidak bisa membuat hashtag? Satu hal sederhana yang semua media sosial miliki bahkan Facebook dan Instagram namun tidak ada di Threads. Seperti apa?

review_description: The app is incredible..but I have a problem because i can't see my followers and those following me
translated_description: Aplikasinya luar biasa..tapi saya punya masalah karena saya tidak bisa melihat pengikut saya dan mereka yang mengikuti saya

review_description: Lots of Bugs. Firstly, No dark Mode Secondly, no edit option of pic while posting. etc.
translated_description: Banyak Bug. Pertama, Tanpa Mode Gelap Kedua, tidak ada opsi edit gambar saat memposting. dll.

review_description: No widgets? Really? Have a scrollable full screen widget.
translated_description: Tidak ada widget? Benar-benar? Memiliki widget layar penuh yang dapat digulir.

review_description: I am having some issues,like I can't scroll the page....it is like some bugs I feel....
translated_description: Saya mengalami beberapa masalah, seperti saya tidak dapat menggulir halaman....seperti ada beberapa bug yang saya rasakan....

review_description: Whenever I want to read something on it and reply to it, this app closes and says there is a bug in this app?
translated_description: Setiap kali saya ingin membaca sesuatu dan membalasnya, aplikasi ini menutup dan mengatakan ada bug di aplikasi ini?

review_description: I can't find follow requests sent to me in the ‚ù§ section. It was there but than disappeared? I am very disappointed with it
translated_description: Saya tidak dapat menemukan permintaan mengikuti yang dikirimkan kepada saya di bagian ‚ù§. Itu ada di sana tapi kemudian menghilang? Saya sangat kecewa dengan hal itu

review_description: very useful till now. the only thing i miss here till now is saving photo.. please add this option
translated_description: sangat berguna sampai saat ini. satu-satunya hal yang saya rindukan di sini sampai sekarang adalah menyimpan foto.. silakan tambahkan opsi ini

review_description: This app is COMPLETELY UNUSABLE on my Xiaomi Redmi note 7. Hope a fix is coming soon.
translated_description: Aplikasi ini SEPENUHNYA TIDAK DAPAT DIGUNAKAN di Xiaomi Redmi note 7 saya. Semoga perbaikan segera terjadi.

review_description: Unable to use Instagram, after download of this app Instagram was not working in my mobile
translated_description: Tidak dapat menggunakan Instagram, setelah mengunduh aplikasi ini Instagram tidak berfungsi di ponsel saya

review_description: Continuously Force closes when trying to upload posts.
translated_description: Terus menerus Tutup paksa saat mencoba mengunggah postingan.

review_description: This app is the best app ever... Kudos to you Mark but the app needs to have DM and Verification requirements
translated_description: Aplikasi ini adalah aplikasi terbaik yang pernah ada... Pujian untuk Anda Tandai tetapi aplikasi harus memiliki persyaratan DM dan Verifikasi

review_description: Very good this app but this app in privacy seen for example location photo etc. üòÜüòÜ
translated_description: Sangat bagus aplikasi ini tetapi aplikasi ini dalam privasi terlihat misalnya foto lokasi dll. üòÜüòÜ

review_description: The app is randomly crashing when attaching a photo
translated_description: Aplikasi mogok secara acak saat melampirkan foto

review_description: So much spam. I go to a popular post and 70% of the replies are people saying to do 'x' for $5,000 or proving links. It's a ton of spam and bots at the moment. Makes me sadly go back to Twitter for now.
translated_description: Begitu banyak spamnya. Saya membuka postingan populer dan 70% balasannya adalah orang-orang yang mengatakan untuk melakukan 'x' seharga $5.000 atau tautan pembuktian. Saat ini banyak sekali spam dan bot. Membuat saya sedih kembali ke Twitter untuk saat ini.

review_description: I have noticed some bug on this App...... Clear the bug I have to review it.....
translated_description: Saya telah melihat beberapa bug pada Aplikasi ini...... Hapus bug Saya harus meninjaunya.....

review_description: WHY IS THERE NO HASHTAG SYSTEM ON THREADS? IT'S SO HARD TO LOOK FOR MESSAGES WITH SPECIFIC WORDS THAT I WANT TO SEARCH FOR BECAUSE THERE IS NO SPECIFIC "HASHTAG" SYSTEM. I HOPE THREADS CAN IMPLEMENT A HASHTAG SYSTEM ASAP.
translated_description: KENAPA TIDAK ADA SISTEM HASHTAG DI THREADS? SANGAT SULIT MENCARI PESAN DENGAN KATA KHUSUS YANG INGIN SAYA CARI KARENA TIDAK ADA SISTEM "HASHTAG" KHUSUS. SAYA BERHARAP THREADS DAPAT MENERAPKAN SISTEM HASHTAG SECEPATNYA.

review_description: Tried to change my username through Instagram after I was done the app didn't work again.
translated_description: Mencoba mengubah nama pengguna saya melalui Instagram setelah saya selesai, aplikasinya tidak berfungsi lagi.

review_description: The app is good but if we can message each other it will be much fun to use
translated_description: Aplikasinya bagus tapi jika kita bisa saling berkirim pesan pasti akan sangat menyenangkan untuk digunakan

review_description: Great but needs a trending tab, and a sfw feature. It is not sfw.
translated_description: Bagus tapi membutuhkan tab trending, dan fitur sfw. Ini bukan sfw.

review_description: uploading picture caused the app closed immediately, fix it
translated_description: mengunggah gambar menyebabkan aplikasi segera ditutup, perbaiki

review_description: Allow us to use multiple accounts at a time like "switch account" and also add a "like section" where we can see what we like or how many post we have liked.
translated_description: Izinkan kami menggunakan banyak akun sekaligus seperti "ganti akun" dan juga menambahkan "bagian suka" di mana kami dapat melihat apa yang kami suka atau berapa banyak postingan yang kami sukai.

review_description: It's glitching way too Much plz fix this app or update it as soon as possible
translated_description: Terlalu banyak gangguan. Tolong perbaiki aplikasi ini atau perbarui sesegera mungkin

review_description: BRO..THIS APP CRASHES A LOTT..I MEAN..AS SOON AS I OPEN THE APP..IDK WHAT HAPPENES..EBERY BUTTON OR TEXT OR IMAHE START OVERLAPPING EACH OTHER OR SOMETHING..IDK BUT THIS JS HAPPENING WITH MOST OF US..FIXX IT AS SOON AS POSSIBLE..WE CAN'T DO A SINGLE TASK WITH THIS GLITCH..I WANNA CHECK THE APP AND ITS FEATURES..BUT THIS SRUPID GLITCH IN FRONT APPERS AND DOESN'T END
translated_description: BRO..APLIKASI INI BANYAK RUSAK..MASUK SAYA..SEGERA SAYA MEMBUKA APLIKASI..IDK APA YANG TERJADI..TOMBOL ATAU TEKS EBERY ATAU IMAHE MULAI TUMPANGAN SATU LAIN ATAU SESUATU..IDK TAPI JS INI TERJADI PADA SEBAGIAN BESAR KAMI..PERBAIKI SEGERA MUNGKIN..KAMI TIDAK BISA MELAKUKAN SATU TUGAS DENGAN GLITCH INI..SAYA INGIN MEMERIKSA APLIKASI DAN FITURNYA..TAPI GLITCH SRUPID INI DI DEPAN DAN TIDAK BERAKHIR

review_description: App crashes while attching pics. Fix this pls.
translated_description: Aplikasi mogok saat melampirkan foto. Tolong perbaiki ini.

review_description: Please add ‚Äúfollows you‚Äù behind their username so users can easily distinguished who are their mutuals.
translated_description: Silakan tambahkan ‚Äúmengikuti Anda‚Äù di belakang nama penggunanya sehingga pengguna dapat dengan mudah membedakan siapa saja yang menjadi mutualnya.

review_description: Great app everything but there shoud be an option where we can message other users
translated_description: Aplikasi bagus semuanya tetapi harus ada opsi di mana kita dapat mengirim pesan ke pengguna lain

review_description: laggy, can't even scrool without letters overlapping, can't read anything
translated_description: lamban, bahkan tidak bisa menggulir tanpa huruf yang tumpang tindih, tidak bisa membaca apa pun

review_description: Not an independent social media. All related to Instagram. Even account is created with Instagram details. Can't deactivate account without deactivating Instagram
translated_description: Bukan media sosial yang independen. Semua berhubungan dengan Instagram. Bahkan akun dibuat dengan detail Instagram. Tidak dapat menonaktifkan akun tanpa menonaktifkan Instagram

review_description: Excessive amount of data it requests and also shares with 3rd parties. Copy cat of twitter. What happened to Facebook I wonder.
translated_description: Jumlah data yang diminta dan dibagikan secara berlebihan kepada pihak ketiga. Salin kucing twitter. Apa yang terjadi dengan Facebook, saya bertanya-tanya.

review_description: Great app. Please add feature to search stocks by $SPY etc
translated_description: Aplikasi bagus. Silakan tambahkan fitur untuk mencari saham berdasarkan $SPY dll

review_description: It's crashing every 5 minutes. What kind of behaviour is this Mark üíÄ
translated_description: Itu mogok setiap 5 menit. Perilaku macam apa Mark ini üíÄ

review_description: so clean! i love how minimal the monochromic color pallete that was used.
translated_description: begitu bersih! Saya suka betapa minimnya palet warna monokromatik yang digunakan.

review_description: Anythime I try to add a picture, it keeps exiting the app.
translated_description: Setiap kali saya mencoba menambahkan gambar, aplikasi terus keluar.

review_description: It's just a poor man's Twitter or a what Instagram would be like without pictures üò≠
translated_description: Itu hanya Twitter orang malang atau Instagram jadinya seperti apa tanpa gambar üò≠

review_description: It's a good start but they have to add some thing before it can be great: 1. They need to add an option to see only people you follow instead of an annoying algorithm. 2. They need to let you mute all posts from languages you don't want or not know. 3. They also need to add option to change the name without changing the Instagram name. 4. Another useful think would be the ability to zoom on an image and staying zoomed without it snapping back to normal size. 5. They need a website.
translated_description: Ini adalah awal yang baik tetapi mereka harus menambahkan beberapa hal sebelum menjadi hebat: 1. Mereka perlu menambahkan opsi untuk hanya melihat orang yang Anda ikuti, bukan algoritma yang mengganggu. 2. Mereka perlu membiarkan Anda membisukan semua postingan dari bahasa yang tidak Anda inginkan atau tidak Anda ketahui. 3. Mereka juga perlu menambahkan opsi untuk mengganti nama tanpa mengubah nama Instagram. 4. Pemikiran berguna lainnya adalah kemampuan untuk memperbesar gambar dan tetap memperbesarnya tanpa mengembalikannya ke ukuran normal. 5. Mereka membutuhkan sebuah situs web.

review_description: The cookie is still in the oven, but you're impatient and want it now. Cons: Videos not playing after unmuting. No hashtags. Feed is too random and crowded. Needs a following tab. Lots of "account growth" spam. No alt text. Pros: Blocking, and muting does the job. UI is clean. Harassment is manageable. Not owned by Elon. It's not Twitter.
translated_description: Kuenya masih di dalam oven, tapi Anda sudah tidak sabar dan menginginkannya sekarang. Kontra: Video tidak diputar setelah dibunyikan. Tidak ada hashtag. Pakan terlalu acak dan ramai. Membutuhkan tab berikut. Banyak spam "pertumbuhan akun". Tidak ada teks alternatif. Kelebihan: Memblokir dan mematikan suara berhasil. UI bersih. Pelecehan dapat dikelola. Bukan milik Elon. Ini bukan Twitter.

review_description: Every positive review you see that only says "Great app! 5 stars!" Or "Love it" etc is actually just a paid for bot account out of China or India. Zuckerbucks is a tool and buys and sells your data with every facebook/Instagram/threads profile you use. Just....don't. Wake up people!

Zuckerbucks adalah alat yang membeli dan menjual data Anda dengan setiap profil facebook/Instagram/thread yang Anda gunakan. Hanya....jangan. Bangun semuanya!

review_description: Nice attempt on copying Twitter but I find some things not so comfortable in this app. For example, I can't separate posts in a feed between recommendations and my follows. Itu hanyalah daftar besar publikasi yang tak ada habisnya dari orang-orang yang tidak saya kenal dan tidak saya pedulikan. Akan lebih bagus juga jika memiliki tombol "simpan media".

Sumbangkan suara Anda ke ruang publik digital umat manusia! Cara terbaik untuk melawan misinformasi adalah merespons dengan informasi yang akurat, bukan sensor.

review_description: The app is easy to use and has a clean interface. It has all the features I need to stay connected with friends and family. I particularly like the community notes feature, which helps create a better informed world by empowering people to collaboratively add context to potentially misleading Tweets. I also like the new pic in pic feature, which makes it easy to watch video while scrolling the feeds. Overall, I would highly recommend this app to everyone.
translated_description: Aplikasi ini mudah digunakan dan memiliki antarmuka yang bersih. Ia memiliki semua fitur yang saya perlukan untuk tetap terhubung dengan teman dan keluarga. Saya sangat menyukai fitur catatan komunitas, yang membantu menciptakan dunia yang lebih terinformasi dengan memberdayakan masyarakat untuk secara kolaboratif menambahkan konteks ke Tweet yang berpotensi menyesatkan. Saya juga menyukai fitur pic in pic baru, yang memudahkan menonton video sambil menggulir feed. Secara keseluruhan, saya sangat merekomendasikan aplikasi ini kepada semua orang.

review_description: One of the standout features of the Thread app is its user interface. It is clean, intuitive, and easy to navigate. The design is aesthetically pleasing, with a focus on simplicity, which makes using the app a pleasant experience. Whether you're a tech-savvy individual or someone who prefers a user-friendly interface, Thread strikes a perfect balance.

Desainnya estetis, dengan fokus pada kesederhanaan, yang membuat penggunaan aplikasi menjadi pengalaman yang menyenangkan. Baik Anda individu yang paham teknologi atau seseorang yang lebih menyukai antarmuka ramah pengguna, Thread memberikan keseimbangan sempurna.

review_description: Love it. It's going to take time to get all of our friends from the app that shall not be named over to Threads, so be patient with the content. Much like Instagram, it's going to show you celebrity content first. Just mute those accounts and seek out the content you want. Politics? Start with news orgs, then move to journalists. By 48-72 hours it'll start shaping up to what you had on the app that shall not be named pre hostile takeover by "him."
translated_description: Suka sekali. Perlu waktu untuk memasukkan semua teman kita dari aplikasi yang tidak disebutkan namanya ke Threads, jadi bersabarlah dengan kontennya. Sama seperti Instagram, ini akan menampilkan konten selebriti terlebih dahulu. Matikan saja akun-akun itu dan cari konten yang Anda inginkan. Politik? Mulailah dengan organisasi berita, lalu beralih ke jurnalis. Dalam 48-72 jam, itu akan mulai sesuai dengan apa yang Anda miliki di aplikasi yang tidak boleh disebutkan sebelum pengambilalihan bermusuhan oleh "dia".

review_description: Promising. However, there' s a very scary feauture that most are not aware of: deleting your THREADS account automatically deletes your Instagram account. Seems that this app was created to wipe out the ability to anonymously post as was the case with Twitter. Now, everyone posting from Threads will be directly identifiable with an Instagram acount (stay tuned for the day that you must PAY a subscriber fee to maintain existing accounts on Threads/Instagram).
translated_description: Menjanjikan. Namun, ada fitur yang sangat menakutkan yang tidak disadari oleh sebagian besar orang: menghapus akun THREADS Anda secara otomatis menghapus akun Instagram Anda. Tampaknya aplikasi ini dibuat untuk menghilangkan kemampuan memposting secara anonim seperti yang terjadi pada Twitter. Sekarang, setiap orang yang memposting dari Threads akan langsung dapat diidentifikasi dengan akun Instagram (nantikan hari dimana Anda harus MEMBAYAR biaya pelanggan untuk mempertahankan akun yang ada di Threads/Instagram).

review_description: It's a great start! I do feel like when adding photos we should have the ability to choose what album we pick from bc I have a ton of images on my phone and scrolling to hunt for them in 10k images isn't fun. Also I feel like there should be in app DMs as that's part of what makes things like Twitter so usable the ability to talk to our friends about threads or post. To what I DO love is the ability to add more than four photos at a time, the ability to write long multi post threads.
translated_description: Ini awal yang baik! Saya merasa ketika menambahkan foto kita harus memiliki kemampuan untuk memilih album apa yang kita pilih karena saya memiliki banyak sekali gambar di ponsel saya dan menggulir untuk mencarinya dalam 10 ribu gambar tidaklah menyenangkan. Saya juga merasa seharusnya ada DM dalam aplikasi karena itulah bagian yang membuat hal-hal seperti Twitter dapat digunakan untuk berbicara dengan teman-teman kita tentang topik atau kiriman. Yang saya sukai adalah kemampuan untuk menambahkan lebih dari empat foto sekaligus, kemampuan untuk menulis thread multi-posting yang panjang.

review_description: Apps alright but probably won't use it as much as twitter.

review_description: Literally it gives a great experience It is more better than any social media app

review_description: Instagram is also a good app but you are insulting yourself by launching this app because you are copying Twitter app and not launching any other thing.

review_description: I'm worried I can't save videos or pictures... that's a problem though

review_description: Why my app keeps crashing while uploading my photo? Please help
translated_description: Mengapa aplikasi saya terus mogok saat mengunggah foto saya? Tolong bantu

review_description: Many Bugs Including Sudden App Crash In Certain Threads & Sometimes It Says Content Unavailable

review_description: it keeps bugging, i can't read post from my phone

review_description: Very useful and convenient app in the world

review_description: Fix the damn replies it crashes when I tap to open them
translated_description: Perbaiki balasan sialan itu yang mogok saat saya ketuk untuk membukanya

review_description: Very basic. Third rate Twitter knock off. Just get Twitter.

review_description: If you copy something at least make it better than the original. This is utter rubbish
translated_description: Jika Anda menyalin sesuatu setidaknya buatlah itu lebih baik dari aslinya. Ini benar-benar sampah
